medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days ago after eating beef belly. Initially presented to the ED with these symptoms and was discharged after feeling better. Overnight, experienced three episodes of black stool. Abdominal pain worsened with food.
medical_history.past_medical_history: DM type II on metformin, HTN, HLD, chronic hepatitis B
medical_history.family_history: No one in his family has stomach disease or liver disease. He does not know what his parents died of.
